resources.string: Serves as a complete reference to all shlokas and names with their meanings. Learn and Listen to the complete Sahasranama right from its history, dhyana shlokas, detailed explanation of the names including the Mangala shlokas.
Swipe to the left/right to browse through all the shlokas.
All images/media are copyrights of the respective owners wherever applicable. Thanks to https://archive.org/download/VishnuSahasranam/VishnuSahasranam.mp3 for the audio.
